title: decentrasoft
author: decentrasoft
content: Hi all,I'm selling 4 tickets from Moscow to Istanbul for 24.09.2022 for 0.35 BTC. Feel free to contact me for further information.

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.created_time: September 23, 2022, 06:14:05 AMLast edit: September 24, 2022, 07:48:41 AM by decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on September 22, 2022, 06:25:28 PMHi all,I'm selling 4 tickets from Moscow to Istanbul for 24.09.2022 for 0.35 BTC. Feel free to contact me for further information.6 hours left to free of charge to change the names of the tickets, we can negotiate the price

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Quote from: decentrasoft on September 23, 2022, 06:14:05 AMQuote from: decentrasoft on September 22, 2022, 06:25:28 PMHi all,I'm selling 4 tickets from Moscow to Istanbul for 24.09.2022 for 0.35 BTC. Feel free to contact me for further information.6 hours left to change the names of the tickets, we can negotiate the pricethe price is reduced from 0.35 BTC to 0.25 BTC as the time for changing the names is running out

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: There is still opportunity to change the names of the tickets for 150 as an airline commission. The tickets can be sold separately
